name: Intercom Conversation AI
description: Real-time conversational AI agent for Intercom that handles live chat, proactive outreach, and customer engagement across web and mobile platforms

skills.name: Live Chat Response
skills.description: Provide instant responses to customer inquiries in live chat with context-aware, personalized messaging
examples: Respond to: 'How do I upgrade my plan?'

skills.name: Intent Recognition
skills.description: Identify customer intent from messages to route to appropriate workflows or human agents
examples: Detect intent: 'I want to cancel my subscription'
Classify: Is this sales inquiry or support issue?

skills.name: Proactive Customer Outreach
skills.description: Initiate personalized outreach based on user behavior, page visits, and engagement patterns
examples: Trigger message for user on pricing page for 5+ minutes
Send onboarding tip based on feature usage
Offer assistance to user showing confusion signals

skills.name: Human Handoff Orchestration
skills.description: Seamlessly transfer conversations to human agents with full context and conversation summary
examples: Transfer to sales team with qualification data
Escalate to tier-2 support with issue summary
Hand off to billing specialist with context

skills.name: Multilingual Conversation
skills.description: Detect customer language and respond in their preferred language across 40+ supported languages
